magic_ring hook into the front loop only of the next single_crochet - single_crochet two stitches yarn over and pull through increase - two single_crochet in one stitch those two stitches yarn over and pull decrease - invisible decrease* through the remaining two loops on your hook notes this pattern was worked using yarn under then yarn over stitches yu/yo size may change depending on how stitches are worked this pattern is worked in continuous rounds don t join any of your rounds with a slip_stitch and chain unless otherwise noted use a stitch marker to mark the beginnings of your rounds to help keep track of them you can use a different weight of yarn but make sure to adjust your hook size to match size of final product may change finished size is approximately 5 5 inches 14 cm tall and 5 inches 12 cm long 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved lofthouse sugar cookie cookie frosting in beige yarn in another color of yarn 1 mc - 8sc 8 1 mc - 8sc 8 2 *increase* x8 16 2 *increase* x8 16 3 *single_crochet increase* x8 24 3 *single_crochet increase* x8 24 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x8 32 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x8 32 5 *3sc increase* x8 40 6 single_crochet around 40 --> fasten_off and leave a very long 7 *3sc decrease* x8 32 tail 8 *single_crochet decrease single_crochet* x8 24 9 *single_crochet decrease* x8 16 sew onto the top of the cookie all the way 10 *decrease* x8 8 around the edge then weave in the tail --> fasten_off and pull closed sprinkles do not stuff weave in the tail in 2-3 other colors of yarn sew in around 12-18 sprinkles in a couple of different colors onto the frosting by weaving the yarn in and out of the frosting each sprinkle should be 1-2 stitches long 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved congratulations you ve completed a lofthouse sugar cookie although i might not suggest eating this one at least it will never go stale o t thanks so much for following my pattern please feel free to follow me d r on instagram and ravelry and be a part of my crochet community a w h c r u o o f t instagram @jainas crochet corner k n facebook & pinterest jaina s crochet corner o o g i l n i pi ravelry jainascrochet e e etsy jainascrochetcorner1 k all patterns
